meanings.definition: The act of emphasizing or highlighting text by using italics.
meanings.sent1: I used italicization to make the important words stand out in my essay.
meanings.sent2: The article looked more professional with the italicization of key points.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's love for italicization was evident in her colorful lesson plans.
meanings.sent4: Her bold use of italicization in the presentation captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The book cover's italicization of the title made it easy to spot on the shelf.

meanings.definition: The process of slanting characters in a typeface to the right for emphasis or distinction.
meanings.sent1: During the design process, the graphic designer focused on perfecting the italicization of the font.
meanings.sent2: The italicization of the company logo added a touch of elegance to their branding.
meanings.sent3: The typewriter struggled with italicization, resulting in a comical mix of slanted letters.
meanings.sent4: In the world of typography, italicization is like adding a stylish twist to plain text.
meanings.sent5: The artist's signature had a unique flair due to the italicization of his name.
